head.name: I'm Pedro Medina!
head.description: Computer Technician, Web Developer and Passionate about technology.

about.paragraphOne: Hi! ðŸ‘‹ I'm Pedro Medina, a web programmer and a University Technician in Computer Science. I've worked in technical support and networks, but my passion is web development and programming.
about.paragraphTwo: I'm proficient in JavaScript and Python, React and Django frameworks, and libraries like Tailwind and Bootstrap to create functional interfaces. I also have experience with backend (Django) and databases (MySQL/PostgreSQL), which allows me to develop complete projects, although I'm still gaining experience.
about.paragraphThree: My goal is to join a team where I can put my knowledge into practice while learning and improving my skills. I'm self-taught, committed, and look for opportunities to demonstrate my potential, even as a junior. I adapt to the team's needs and commit to established work objectives.

projectBakery.title: Bakery Landing Page
projectBakery.description: Bakery landing page. Developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this website is responsive and adapts to all devices.

projectEcommerce.title: E-Commerce
projectEcommerce.description: E-commerce store with shopping cart and product filter. Developed with Python using Django and a MySQL database.

projecPokemon.title: PokÃ©mon Website
projecPokemon.description: Pokemon site using the 'PokeApi' API to display most of the data offered. Developed with React and Bootstrap.

projectBombita.title: Administrative Event Control System
projectBombita.description: Event control system, with event registration, users and reenactors, payment control, event evaluation, filtering, etc. Developed with React for the frontend and Django for the backend.

footer.messageOne: Every line of code that you write is a step towards mastery.
footer.messageTwo: Clean code today will be your pride tomorrow.
